name: Clocky's Time !
description:
In Clocky's time, you can jump and run around as Clocky in this little platformer made for the Godot wild jam #55.  

To move use WASD or you can change it to ZQSD in the settings.

Space to jump and ctrl or S to slide.

That's it enjoy ! (the game might have uptade with new levels in the future)

Thanks at the wonderful musician https://turbobetti.itch.io/( music and sfx )   at https://psycho-sun-interactive.itch.io/ for the cool backgrounds and at Loumunix#3683 https://itch.io/profile/loumunix for the code.
